title: i cant logging on
body:
Since this update. (5.11), i cant logging on, 
 always doing login status for half hour and no any responds.
i try use different type of net, include phone hot point, it not work.

replies.body: Could be your anti virus ? bout the only time i have trouble with LoL is when my pc is got a virus clean it out sud work{{champion:106}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3717}}

What OS are you on?

Could you run a networks diagnostics on your machine? Do you know how to do that?
